short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Find businesses in seconds for the sole purpose of generating B2B leads.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en_GB,en_US,e:
Use this Bing Maps Scraper extension to find emails of companies to save time, boost productivity and prospecting! 

If you are "I like to find my leads within minutes" type of person, then today is your lucky day.

* Find leads for you business in any industry across all countries
* Qualify leads faster than ever before 
* Increase productivity by reducing hours spent looking for leads

This is the fastest way to extract valuable leads from businesses (e.g., web designers in London, bicycle shops in Amsterdam, restaurants in New York, etc.) within Bing Maps.

How it works?
All you have to do is use Bing Maps like you normally do, while the extension finds the business emails automatically in the background for you - ready to be downloaded when you open up the extension. 

Or check our guide on our website at https://www.leads-extractor.com/bing-maps-edition-guide/

Best for:
Business owners - Sales Teams - SaaS Companies - Growth Hackers - Recruiters - Account Managers - Marketing Teams

Ran into any issues? Ideas? Contact us at support@leads-extractor.com

You can use the TRIAL version (limited data) to see how the bing maps scraper / tool works and decide to upgrade to our unlimited results plan for a fair monthly subscription - cancel anytime you like, no questions asked!

=======
Leads Extractor for Bing Maps is a powerful tool to boost your company or product for a fair monthly price and unlimited access. If you are having troubles with either PixLeads Extractor, Presto G Map Extractor or even GMaps then this might be an alternative for you as a business explorer. It works like any Google Maps Scraper would, but this extension is for Bing Maps to enrich company data to save time, boost productivity and prospecting! 

DISCLAIMER: All data collected by the leads extractor extension will not be stored locally on the computer where you install the extension. The extension will NOT attempt to offload, distribute, broadcast, sell or in any way share collected data. We designed Leads Extractor with the privacy of the user's data in mind.

Privacy policy: https://www.leads-extractor.com/privacy/

Copyright © 2018 - 2024 Leads Extractor
Bing Maps™ is a trademark of Microsoft.
Use of this trademark is subject to Microsoft Permissions.
long.en,en_AU:
Use this Bing Maps Scraper extension to find emails of companies to save time, boost productivity and prospecting! 

If you are "I like to find my leads within minutes" type of person, then today is your lucky day.

* Find leads for you business in any industry across all countries
* Qualify leads faster than ever before 
* Increase productivity by reducing hours spent looking for leads

This is the fastest way to extract valuable leads from businesses (e.g., web designers in London, bicycle shops in Amsterdam, restaurants in New York, etc.) within Bing Maps.

How it works?
All you have to do is use Bing Maps like you normally do (similar to Google Maps), while the extension finds the business emails automatically in the background for you - ready to be downloaded when you open up the extension. 

Or check our guide on our website at https://www.leads-extractor.com/bing-maps-edition-guide/

Ran into any issues? Ideas? Contact us at support@leads-extractor.com

You can use the TRIAL version (limited data) to see how the bing maps scraper / tool works and decide to upgrade to our unlimited results plan for a fair monthly subscription - cancel anytime you like, no questions asked!

It works like any Google Maps Scraper would, but this extension is for Bing Maps to enrich company data to save time, boost productivity and prospecting! 

DISCLAIMER: All data collected by the leads extractor extension will not be stored locally on the computer where you install the extension.
